Class Detail

GlobalDetector()
Used to detect globals. works in node.js and browser from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5088203/how-to-detect-creation-of-new-global-variables

Field Detail

<static> GlobalDetector.ignoreList
list of variables name to ignore. populated at constructor() time

Method Detail

  • {Boolean} check(onChange)
    Check if any new global has been declared
    Parameters:
    {Function+} onChange
    optional callback called synchronously if a new global is found
    Returns:
    {Boolean} true if some new globals have been detected, false otherwise
  • {Object} foundGlobals()
    getter for the foundGlobals up to now
    Returns:
    {Object} object with keys as property names
  • start(onChange, period)
    Start periodically monitoring
    Parameters:
    {Function+} onChange
    optional callback called when a new global is found
    {Number+} period
    period at which it is checked
  • stop()
    Stop periodically monitoring
